enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve normalizing whitespace in strings, making them complementary for setting up test cases.
The method is used within appendNormalisedWhitespace to determine if a character is whitespace, making it essential for setting up test cases.
appendNormalisedWhitespace uses a StringBuilder, which can be initialized using borrowBuilder, ensuring proper resource management.
After appendNormalisedWhitespace completes, the StringBuilder should be released using releaseBuilder to manage resources efficiently.
